Case Histories speelt zich af tegen het fraaie historische decor van de Schotse hoofdstad Edinburgh.

Voor de buitenwereld is hij tamelijk ontoegankelijk. Maar achter de stoere faÃƒÂ§ade schuilt een verrassend gevoelige persoonlijkheid. 
Jackson komt graag op voor mensen die het moeilijk hebben.

Jackson Brodie is a private investigator, originally from Yorkshire, who lives in Edinburgh to be near his daughter, Marlee.
A former soldier and policeman he now makes his money working from investigating infidelity and finding missing cats. 
Jackson's tough-guy exterior belies a deeply empathetic heart. 
He's unable to resist coming to the rescue and increasingly he becomes a magnet for the bereaved, the lost and the dysfunctional. 
His ability to connect comes from his own tragic childhood that still haunts him. 
At the beginning of series two Jackson's life has taken a surprising turn both personally and professionally. 
Will he be able to make his way back to where his heart and morality lie? Or has he been permanently compromised?

Acteurs: Millie Innes, Kirsty Mitchell, Amanda Abbington, Natasha Little, Zawe Ashton, Millie Innes and more
